sent.orig: A real programmer either smoke two packs of cigarettes one day or never smoke at all.
sent.trans: 我一天倒是抽两包烟了，可是还不是一个真正的程序员。

sent.orig: Smoke fewer cigarettes! Who can bear all the smoke in the room?
sent.trans: 你们少抽点烟，满屋子的烟气谁受得了。

sent.orig: Cannabis smoke actually contains higher concentrations of carcinogenic polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) than tobacco smoke.
sent.trans: 抽叶子其实比抽烟含有更多的致癌的多环芳香烃化合物。

sent.orig: This paper explores the law of the smoke flowing, evacuating measures and smoke ventilation.
sent.trans: 对地下建筑烟气流动规律、人员的安全疏散及其防排烟措施进行了探讨。
